meta._et_pb_old_content:
The box "Phosphenic Pocket Lamp Initiatic" includes:
- 1x portable lamp with a "double screen filter" and "two lighting modes".
- 1x charger (compatible with 110V and 220V).
- 1x user manual (downloadable in your bill).
